body:
hello avicus its me rilo
I just got a reply on my ban appeal and im not getting unbanned so this means I can not play avicus for a very very very long time. I just wanted to say I'm very sorry to everyone i was mean to over my months on avicus and I would like to say have fun. So I hope you guys are good that Im banned cause I dont want to ruin your lives.

BYE AVICUS
